item.description:
For the price of what you'd spend on a couple of dirty martini with extra olives,
you can meet up to 12 different different members of the opposite sx. Mingle over cocktails and soft music, then have up to 7-12 five minute brief encounters with possible matches. You could walk in with a calendar ready to be filled with dates and leave with several new possibilities. Now that's what I call a happy hour.


PLEASE REMEMBER:
* We run 3 Meetup Groups, plus maintain our own outside Dating Advice & Events Website. We advertise on Facebook, Twitter, Blogs, etc. Most registrations come through our outside events website, not Meetup. Therefore the number of RSVPs reflected here are NOT the total number of men or women registered.


If you don't get any matches, you'll receive a promo code so you can try another event at half price!


PAYMENT POLICY:
$25 (MUST register with code MOXIENEW)

$23 IF YOU REGISTER WITH A FRIEND

REGISTER AND PAY HERE:
http://moxiespeeddateboston.eventbrite.com


PRE-PAYMENT ONLY, PLEASE.

HOW IT WORKS:
*Five minutes goes by in a flash! Before you know it, you`ll be on your last date.
*Make a check next to the names of people you wish to hear from after each date.
*Event Managers will come by, after each round, and collect your card.
*We`ll compare them to your date`s.
*If you and your date both chose to stay in touch with each other, their contact info will be e-mailed tO you within 48 hours.

THINGS TO KNOW:
*Rounds last 5 minutes each
*Match e-mails go out 48 hours after the event
*If you`re 2-3 years older or younger than the age range, you`re still able to attend.
*We do not take cash at the door for these events

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Hour w/ a Twist Speeddate - Singles Ages 35-45
